mapper.delete: delete from house_subscribe where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into house_subscribe (id, house_id, user_id, desc, status, create_time, last_update_time, order_time, telephone, admin_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update house_subscribe set house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, house_id, user_id, desc, status, create_time, last_update_time, order_time, telephone, admin_id from house_subscribe where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, house_id, user_id, desc, status, create_time, last_update_time, order_time, telephone, admin_id from house_subscribe

mapper.select: select * from house_subscribe where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from house_subscribe where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time desc
select * from house_subscribe where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 2 order by create_time desc
